inlineImageAndParagraph.text: The Decentro KYC Text Verification API Phonetic provides precise data validation, going beyond exact string matches. It employs advanced algorithms to intelligently handle phonetic variations, spelling discrepancies, and formatting inconsistencies in textual data. Crucial for Fintechs and financial institutions, this API ensures real-time consistency between user inputs and official records, such as ID cards or bank accounts.

inlineImageAndParagraph2.text: The API utilises the 'Textual Resonance Endpoint' to provide a granular match score. Unlike binary pass/fail checks, our system accounts for cultural name variations and sound-alike spellings, ensuring legitimate customers aren't rejected due to minor typos.

subheadings.title: Our algorithms analyse text through three dimensions:
Phonetic Similarity
bulletPoints: Detects matches based on how words sound rather than just how they are spelled, solving issues with names like 'Sean' vs 'Shawn' or 'Smit' vs 'Smith'.

subheadings.title: Fuzzy Logic Matching
bulletPoints: Identifies similarities despite typos, character transpositions, or partial matches, offering a similarity score that helps automate approval decisions.

subheadings.title: Contextual Analysis
bulletPoints: Handles inconsistent data entry formats and noisy data to extract and compare relevant textual resonance with up to 99.99% accuracy.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.query: What is the Regular Text Matching API?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.solution: It is a component of Decentro’s Farsight Data Forensics suite that compares two strings of text to identify similarities, accounting for spelling errors and phonetic variations to validate identity data.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.query: Does this API support phonetic matching?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.solution: Yes, the API includes a specific Phonetic Match Score that identifies names that sound similar but are spelled differently (e.g., 'Sara' vs 'Sarah'), which is crucial for culturally diverse regions.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.query: How accurate is the matching process?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.solution: Powered by AI algorithms and fuzzy logic, the API achieves up to 99.99% accuracy in text verification, significantly reducing false positives and negatives.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.query: Can I test the API before going live?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.solution: Yes, Decentro provides a Sandbox environment. You can obtain API keys from the dashboard and test the /v2/kyc/match endpoint with sample data before moving to Production.
